about.title: About me
about.intro: Here you’ll find more about who I am, the work I do, and the programming and technology skills I currently offer.
about.subtitle: A glimpse into my journey
about.p1: I’m Leonel, a frontend developer and programming instructor. After several years working in administrative roles, I discovered my true passion in 2020: technology and software development. Since then, I’ve continued to train and grow professionally, and today I specialize in web development, structured programming, and object-oriented programming.
about.p2: I currently work as a high school programming teacher, guiding students through their first steps in the world of software development. I enjoy combining my technical background with a strong pedagogical approach, always aiming to explain concepts in a clear and accessible way.
about.p3: As a frontend developer, my goal is to build modern, responsive, and high-performing websites designed to deliver a seamless and professional user experience. I aim to support individuals, entrepreneurs, and brands looking to enhance their digital presence with clean, reliable, and fully tailored solutions.
